analysis.description: erc20 in EthTweetMe.sendEthTweet (/unique_chucks/10/0x48d9eac690ba14e055af890cc33e17e2cbc0a37a.sol#209) is a local variable never initialiazed

EthTweetMe.payoutERC20 (/unique_chucks/10/0x48d9eac690ba14e055af890cc33e17e2cbc0a37a.sol#175-185) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-erc20.transfer(feePayoutAddress,erc20.balanceOf(address(this))) (/unique_chucks/10/0x48d9eac690ba14e055af890cc33e17e2cbc0a37a.sol#183-185)

EthTweetMe.sendEthTweet (/unique_chucks/10/0x48d9eac690ba14e055af890cc33e17e2cbc0a37a.sol#197-273) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-erc20.transfer(influencer.influencerAddress,payouts[0]) (/unique_chucks/10/0x48d9eac690ba14e055af890cc33e17e2cbc0a37a.sol#246)
	-erc20.transfer(influencer.charityAddress,payouts[1]) (/unique_chucks/10/0x48d9eac690ba14e055af890cc33e17e2cbc0a37a.sol#252-253)
	-erc20.transfer(feePayoutAddress,payouts[2]) (/unique_chucks/10/0x48d9eac690ba14e055af890cc33e17e2cbc0a37a.sol#265-270)
	-erc20.transfer(webappAddress,payouts[3]) (/unique_chucks/10/0x48d9eac690ba14e055af890cc33e17e2cbc0a37a.sol#272-273)

EthTweetMe.sendERC20Tweet (/unique_chucks/10/0x48d9eac690ba14e055af890cc33e17e2cbc0a37a.sol#309-315) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-erc20.transferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),_amount) (/unique_chucks/10/0x48d9eac690ba14e055af890cc33e17e2cbc0a37a.sol#314)
ERC20Basic.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/10/0x48d9eac690ba14e055af890cc33e17e2cbc0a37a.sol#5-6) should be declared external
